Beer
Type: Consumable
Value: 1
Fine Value: 11
Keywords: Alcohol
Beverage
Search
Keyword: 		Global
Duration: 1000 steps
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

Fermentation may have been a greater discovery than fire.

The Beer item is a consumable.

Attributes

Quality Attributes

Global +2% Double rewards
Global -4% Bonus experience

Global +4% Double rewards
Global -4% Bonus experience

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Reward

Achievement

Beer is needed for the following achievement:

Achievement Name Difficulty Requirement Reward
Helan Går! Easy Drink a Beer [1] 1x achievement point
